review: I was hoping the FireTV would replace my Apple TV but, until plodding Comcast permit HBO GO on Fire TV, I will have to keep the AppleTV as well. So, my major gripe is actually with Comcast. The other reason for switching to the Fire TV is for displaying my family photos uploaded to the cloud. Since unlimited photo storage is now included with a Prime subscription, it is wasteful to also be paying for Apple iCloud storage. Also, I dislike how Apple syncs deletes. The Amazon Photo app on my iOS devices does not sync deletes - so I can delete photos from my phone when I know they have been pushed up to the cloud, and know that they won't also be deleted from the cloud.
